name: Extreme Drag Racing
description:
Extreme Drag Racing - the most realistic and engaging drag racing experience ever created for mobile devices - is finally here!

If you like Drag Games try it for FREE.

Buy all of the Cars. The most expensive is the fastest.

Test your real drag skills.

***FEATURES***

* Day, Night levels
* Easy controllers
* Realistic drag experience and feelings
* Beautiful Graphics
* Realistic sound environment
* Realistic physics
* Tablet support and FULL HD support
* FULL HD graphics with high quality
